name: Paramount Restaurant, The
text:
The Paramount Restaurant

Beverages MENU

BOTTLED WATER $2.00
JUICE BOX $1.75
16 OZ FOUNTAIN POP $3.50
CANNED BEVERAGE $2.50
POWERADE $4.00
SLUSH PUPPY $5.00
HOT COFFEE $2.25
ICED COFFEE $4.00
TEA $2.25

The Paramount Restaurant

Main MENU

HOUSE-MADE PIZZAS
OUR 23cm PIZZA DOUGH IS CRAFTED IN-HOUSE USING FRESH INGREDIENTS, HAND-TOSSED, AND COOKED TO PERFECTION

Vegetarian $16.00
Pickled onions, peppers, and mushrooms on our house-made pizza sauce, crowned with a blend of cheeses

Cheese $16.00
Features house-made pizza sauce topped with a blend of artisanal cheeses

Pepperoni & Cheese $18.00
Canadian pepperoni layered with a blend of cheeses on our house-made pizza sauce

Bacon & Cheese $19.00
Classic bacon bits paired with a blend of cheeses on our house-made pizza sauce

Upgrade any pizza to a panzerotti for no extra charge

SALADS
TOSSED WITH FRESH INGREDIENTS

House Green $8.00
Spring mix salad with cucumbers, dressed in lemon oil vinaigrette, and topped with Parmesan cheese

Caesar $13.00
Spring mix salad tossed with house-made caesar dressing, croutons, Parmesan cheese, pickled onions, and optional bacon

Greek $13.00
Spring mix salad with roasted red peppers, cucumbers, feta cheese, black olives, and lemon-pesto vinaigrette

SANDWICHES & WRAPS
HAND CRAFTED WITH FRESH INGREDIENTS AND SERVED WITH A SIDE OF FRIES

Reuben Sandwich $12.00
Classic Reuben sandwich on Roma Bakery bread, filled with corned beef, Swiss cheese, sauerkraut, and yellow mustard

Cuban Sandwich $13.00
Roasted ham sandwich on Roma Bakery bread with yellow mustard and pickles

Chicken Leek Sandwich $13.00
Pulled chicken, bechamel sauce, and caramelized leeks on Roma Bakery bread

Greek Orzo Wrap $16.00
Roasted red peppers, cucumbers, pesto, feta cheese, black olives, and lemon vinaigrette

Philly Cheese Wrap $17.00
12-hour roast beef with house-made barbecue sauce, fresh mozzarella, tomato salad, and spring mix

Chicken Caesar Wrap $15.00
Grilled chicken with house-made Caesar dressing, croutons, lettuce, pickled onions, and bacon

HOT DOGS
SERVED ON A LOCAL ROMA BAKERY BUN WITH A SIDE OF FRIES

Classic Hot Dog $8.00
Italian Sausage $9.00
Coney Dog $9.50
Grilled italian sausage with house-made coney sauce and cheese

Please notify us of any food restrictions or allergies.

The Paramount Restaurant

Kids MENU

FOOD

Chicken Fingers & Fries $12.00
Two pieces of house-breaded chicken tenders with a side of fries and ketchup
Upgrade to four pieces for $7.00 extra

Hot Dog & Fries $8.00
Classic hot dog on a local Roma Bakery bun, served with a side of fries and ketchup

Grilled Cheese & Fries $9.00
Roma Bakery bread grilled with provolone and mozzarella cheese, served with a side of fries and ketchup

Crispy Fries $5.00
House-made fries with ketchup

SNACKS

Granola Bar $1.00
Chocolate Bar $2.75
Candy Cup $5.75
Large Popcorn $8.00

DRINKS

Bottled Water $2.00
Juice Box $1.75
Canned Beverage $2.50
16oz Fountain Pop $3.50
Slush Puppy $5.00

Please notify us of any food restrictions or allergies.

The Paramount Restaurant

SPIKED SLUSH PUPPIES

TAILWAGGING TEQUILLA
1oz of Tequilla with Lime Slush Puppie

WHISKY WAGGER
1oz of Whisky with Cherry Slush Puppie

VODKA RETRIEVER
1oz of Vodka with Orange Slush Puppie

BLUE BARKTAlL
1oz of Gin with Blue Rasberry Slush Puppie

FIERY FOXHOUND
1oz of Fireball with Orange Slush Puppie

BERRY BEAGLE
1oz of Rum with Strawberry Slush Puppie

CANINE COLADA
1oz of Vodka with Banana Slush Puppie

DESIGN YOUR OWN
1oz of your favourite liquor and any slush puppie flavour shots of your choosing

The Paramount Restaurant
